name: Turn Based Game
description:
I'm leaving link to the GitHub repository if you don't want to downloaded the .exe.

My GitHub: https://github.com/Macrobyte/Turn-Based-Game-Project

This is just a simple text based game I did in C++ for my Year 1 first semester in university.

What each move does:

Attack: Chance to hit is 80% and does 1-10 points of damage.

Special Attack: Chance to hit is 50% and does 5-20 points of damage and also uses 50 energy points.

Recharge: Recharge at 4x the normal rate (1x) and increases the opponent's chance to hit by 10%. 

Dodge: Decreases enemy's chance to hit by 30%, but decreases energy charge rate by 50%.

Heal: Convert up to 50% of your energy into Health. It does not use your turn, so you can do a second action. You cannot heal a second time.
